Text.Page:
Velik's messenger calls you.

Talk to Velie and go to Velik's Sanctuary.

Velik thanks you for averting a major tragedy in Arborea through your awakening and your actions.

But she senses that another disaster is imminent, so your hidden skills must be unleashed.

.

The goddess Velik is looking for you, .

I'll take you to the place where the goddess dwells.

!

Your awakening has prevented a great deal of misfortune. Fortunately, I was keeping a close eye on the tragedy that did not occur.

Unfortunately, the evil energy has not completely dissipated. This can only mean that even greater danger is lurking in the shadows imminent.

There will be a catastrophe that will spare no one.

You may not know it, but there is a power within you that remains hidden. Awaken this power and face the imminent danger. "Hidden power?"

I will awaken your full potential so you can use your hidden reserves.

Are you ready to accept the new power?
